titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: (duty on) = "Serutiny"? (15 Nov) = crossed out, "deruct"? (Birds Beasts) = overwritten more numbers like line above (under Turn of Screw) = publishing info and other book (23 Feb) = "Torrent of Sp"? s2: (under Dec 30) = notation qualifying "overdue" "D.S. Culver," next to "Language Jespersen," seems to be Culver's signature s3: (Jan 21) = "Morrey"? s4: (Feb 31) = illegible financial note (May 29) = "sina'? s5: (Dec 14) = starts with B, ends in "io" s6: Upside down, beginning of another name "Haltel" s7: "Culver" at top of card almost misspelled as "Culler" (over-written) Funny symbol appears twice in "Presley" line, rendered as pi (π) (Presley) = "culue"? (Dec 5) = "Lout in S"? s8: (March 9) = "THN"? marking under "pd"
